name: kege-by-danshaders-ui
description: Web Interface for KEGE by DanShaders
author: Dan Klishch

scripts.lint: shopt -s globstar && GLOBIGNORE='src/proto/*' && eslint src/**/*.ts build.js
scripts.lint-fix: shopt -s globstar && GLOBIGNORE='src/proto/*' && eslint --fix src/**/*.ts build.js
scripts.gen-proto: mkdir -p src/proto && protoc --plugin="protoc-gen-ts=./node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts" --plugin="protoc-gen-diff=../tools/diff-proto/bin/diff-proto" --js_out="import_style=commonjs,binary:./src/proto" --ts_out="./src/proto" --diff_out="./src/proto" -I ../proto `find ../proto -type f -printf "%f "` && sed -i 's/in: /pb_in: /g' src/proto/diff_pb.d.ts
